Description: Limestone head with a duplex wig and a beard.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: B. Porter & R. Moss, 'Topographical Bibliography of Ancient Egyptian Hieroglyphic Texts, Reliefs and Paintings' VIII (Oxford: Clarendon Press), p. 657; W. Seipel, 'Gott. Mensch. Pharao' [exhibition catalogue] (Vienna, 1992), p. 332-3 [130]; P. Kozloff, B. Bryan and M. Berman, 'Egypt's Dazzling Sun' (Cleveland, 1992), p.471 Tab.4b; p.473 Tab.5; P. Kozloff, B. Bryan and M. Berman, 'Amenophis III: Le Pharaon-Soleil' (Paris, 1993), p.405, Tab.40, p.407, Tab.5. E. R. Russmann (ed.), Eternal Egypt, pp. 234-5.
Bibliographic references: Russmann 2001 / Eternal Egypt: Masterworks of Ancient Art from the British Museum (127)
